ðŸ“– Summary: WhisperLiveKit is a real-time, fully local speech-to-text server that transcribes audio directly to a browser. It leverages state-of-the-art research in simultaneous speech processing for low-latency transcription and speaker identification, offering a ready-to-use backend, server, and simple frontend.
